metadata.title: Those Who Illuminate The World's Darkness

tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku wields the decapitators strikes liches that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A Dullahan and its horse gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over wyvern zombies.
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
She smiles, cradling a gem. Her ears bounce up and down.
Sunraku reaches out
She holds her ears and glares
Her ears droop
Sunraku leans in
The humanoid cat in a suit and hat summersaults through the window into the room.
Green label, Musketeers in Boots Vice-Captain, Aramiys
Aramiys pulls out a jeweled rapier and lunges at Sunraku.
Sunraku bends slightly to the right, clearing the blade.
Bilac stomps on Aramiys
He nods
He poses wildly, then takes Bilac's hand
He kisses her hand
She screams
She grabs a hammer
A magic circle disappears him
Tall, fluffy summer clouds float in a blue sky.
Rakuro's house
Trees cast shadows on the road
Rakuro sits in bed. The clock reads 12:58pm.
Katzo
Pencilgon
He falls back in bed and sleeps
Rabbituza Inn
A strike yielding brilliant light
Yellow and blue energy press against each other
Wethermon and Sunraku cross blades
Wethermon's armor cracks
His sword flies
His armor shatters
Dusk over blue crystals on blue buildings
Label, Eighth City, Eighthold
The 2 fight under Sunraku's ghost garb
Players stare and whisper
He notices a girl in an elaborate outfit with a white hat and long, pink braids.
She walks past him and stops
She looks back with piercing blue eyes
Label, Leader of Game Lore Clan, The Library, Professor
Professor sends a friend request
Professor holds out a hand
Rei puts on VR goggles
In Secondale, Players stare and part as Psyger-0 walks down the street.
At a cafe, Reiji talks to Mai
The girls who screenshot Sunraku look at potions in an item shop
Katzo wakes up, sits up, and puts her fists together
Pencilgon stands on a dirt road, looking at a town in the distance.
She turns, the flower pin in her hair
Professor's hand
Under a full moon, Lycagon perches on top of a rock
Lightning strikes behind her
Text, 30, Gems, Ore, and Heads of Equal Hardness
They bounce around between scorpions
He hits her head
